lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Goldstein said that other factors, such as higher speed limits, the gasoline lead phasedown, and possible new restrictions on gasoline vapor pressure could tighten the supply situation this summer.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. gasoline stocks for the week ended April 17 are 37.6 mln barrels above last year's levels, and analysts said they don't believe the expected one to two pct rise in demand will take care of the surplus before the start of the summer driving season, which begins Memorial Day weekend.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bo Poates, an analyst at the Energy Futures Group Inc said he foresees demand up about one pct in the second and third quarters of 1987.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Goldstein said that other factors, such as higher speed limits, the gasoline lead phasedown, and possible new restrictions on gasoline vapor pressure could tighten the supply situation this summer.
